body_html:
Hi @perfinion. I've fixed code style and removed "merge requests", but as result I've recreated the branch, so could you please continue with #22210?

Regarding builds on Windows I see the same issues I had and asked here: https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/#!topic/build/ePYss0Kxcu4. It looks like we need to add copt=-DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN on CI server for Windows builds. What do you think?
body_text:
Hi @perfinion. I've fixed code style and removed "merge requests", but as result I've recreated the branch, so could you please continue with #22210?
Regarding builds on Windows I see the same issues I had and asked here: https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/#!topic/build/ePYss0Kxcu4. It looks like we need to add copt=-DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN on CI server for Windows builds. What do you think?
body:
Hi @perfinion. I've fixed code style and removed "merge requests", but as result I've recreated the branch, so could you please continue with #22210?

Regarding builds on Windows I see the same issues I had and asked here: https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/#!topic/build/ePYss0Kxcu4. It looks like we need to add `copt=-DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN` on CI server for Windows builds. What do you think?
